scripts.build: node scripts/prebuild-warn.cjs && node scripts/runlog.cjs "Build start" && cross-env DEMO_NO_DB= next build
scripts.db:format: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma format --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:validate: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma validate --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate-dev: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma db seed --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset-and-seed: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma migrate reset --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm dlx prisma db seed --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
